name: Auto-UnAim
description:
"Lining up your shots" has a whole new meaning in Auto-UnAim, a Bullet Hell game where you can't control where you shoot! 

Each time you kill an enemy, the direction you shoot will change. This means maneuvering through hectic bullet patterns to face your opponents. Rank up your score for each one you kill.

Sound too difficult? Worry not. You start with 5 health and gain additional health for every enemy you kill. 

Test your skills and see how large you can get your score!

Code by: SilverGold

Music by: Metaroom

Sound Effect Help: Mage1
